CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Art Library relative to Zenith Tech Library?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Art Library is {below} Zenith Tech Library in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Tech Library relative to Borealis Research Hub?
SRP.A: Zenith Tech Library is {below} Borealis Research Hub in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Arcane University Library relative to Aethelgard Art Library?
SRP.A: Arcane University Library is {above} Aethelgard Art Library in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard Art Library}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Research Hub}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Art Library's minimum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Art Library's minimum Library Visits is in {1958}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Art Library's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Art Library's maximum Library Visits is in {1976}.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1965 higher or lower than in 1970?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1965 was {lower} than in 1970.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1971 higher or lower than in 1975?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1971 was {higher} than in 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1968 higher or lower than in 1976?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1968 was {lower} than in 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1970, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1961 and 1970 was {smaller} than between 1963 and 1973.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard Art Library} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Art Library and Borealis Research Hub first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Art Library and Borealis Research Hub first exchanged leading positions in {1959}.
